subtitles: 260719 263507 You are confused, aren't you? Frightened.
263597 265258 That's all right. I can help you.

266391 268348 I am a doctor.
Now, you must listen to me.

268435 271052 You have lost your memory.
There was an experiment.

271146 272978 Something went wrong.
Your memory was erased.

274107 276144 No, I don't understand.
What the hell is going on here?

276234 278726 Just listen. There are people
coming for you even as we speak.

278820 281733 You must not let them find you.
You must leave now.
344386 346798 Hey, Mr. Murdoch. The Automat called.
346888 349721 Said you left your wallet there.

349808 353017 I suggest you retrieve it since
you only paid for 3 weeks...
353103 354969 and they was up 10 minutes ago.

358692 361024 It's right there in black
and white, Mr. Murdoch.

364155 367568 We make our books like we make
our beds, all neat and tidy.
367659 369445 I'll take care of it when I get back.

369536 371652 See that you do. Only thing
makes you a guest...

371746 374033 in this joint, pal,
is cash on the barrel-head.
400650 403392 No days off for good behavior.
425383 428967 Mr. Murdoch, yes, where is he?
429054 432763 He.. he just left not 5 minutes ago.
480105 482142 He said he was your husband's doctor.
482232 483688 He wanted to speak with you.
508133 511125 Schreber. Please, won't you come in?

514222 517305 Thank you for coming to see me
on such short notice.

521813 525807 A rather crude experiment...
designed to further my studies.

527110 532150 You say you're my husband's doctor,
but he never mentioned you to me.

533616 536028 John has been coming to
see me for quite some time.

536119 539783 He had been grappling
with feelings of betrayal...

543043 545205 - John told you what happened?
- Yes.
546296 548537 When was the last time that you saw him?

550133 553842 He packed a suitcase.
He was very angry at me.

553928 556886 I understand how difficult
this must be for you.
556973 558555 But for John's sake, I would like you...

558641 561224 to think of me
as your friend, Emma.

561311 565020 It appears that John has
suffered a psychotic break.

574699 577817 if he were to contact you,
and I suspect he will...

577911 580744 you must call me immediately.
Do you understand?

580830 585119 It is imperative that I be
the first one to reach him.

585210 588544 Wherever your husband is,
he is searching...
604479 607187 It is Mr. Murdoch, isn't it?

674549 677667 I told the guy,
"Cash on the barrel-head."
710168 711624 Am I glad you're here, sir.

711711 714294 They say Detective Walenski's
got the heebie-jeebies.

714380 716667 Just take what they give me,
Husselbeck.

723932 727846 Wow. Looks like somebody
woke up on the wrong side of the bed.
773481 774812 You left your wallet here, buddy.
774899 776139 When... when, when did I do that?

777402 780485 - When... when was that?
- When you left your wallet.

813021 815729 Haven't you mugs got
anything better to do? Hm?

815815 818022 Well, I'm just trying
to do my job, May.

818109 820146 There's a killer out there
in case you hadn't noticed.

820236 822944 Maybe you should be out looking for him
instead of cooling your heels, huh?
826284 827945 Aw, go on, get out of here.

850433 853516 What's that make so far, Husselbeck?
6 hookers in all?
855104 857562 Give the man an "A" for effort.

857648 859855 You'd think these stiffs
would have the good grace...
859942 862058 to expire at a good time of night.
863071 865028 Hey, too bad about Walenski, huh?

879796 886088 what kind of killer do you think
stops to save a dying fish?

889389 892598 This killer's been running circles
around us thanks to Walenski.

894519 897432 I've known Eddie a long time.
He's a good cop.

897522 901686 Whatever kind of cop Walenski once was,
he let drift a long time ago.
921421 922707 Let me go, let me go!
922797 924253 I'm not gonna hurt you. I'm not...
935935 939053 I'm being punished for my sins, right?
939147 941479 What did I ever do to inherit this?

942692 947653 Well, everything Detective Walenski
committed to paper should be here, so...

947738 951231 The only thing that should
be committed is Walenski.
952827 955159 Nothing like a little healthy paranoia.

958708 961826 Sir, we just got
the fingerprint results in.
965214 966955 What is this, some kind of joke?

982106 984814 I came here to file
a missing persons report for my husband.
985610 987442 Take it to the front desk.
987528 989360 They told me to come see you.

994368 997360 Mrs. Murdoch,
why didn't you report this before?

997455 1002575 I mean, if your husband has been missing
as long as you say...

1002668 1005376 I thought he'd simply
walked out on me.

1006547 1010461 Then a... doctor contacted me
this evening.
1010551 1012133 How long have you been married?

1016516 1019554 Because you seem uncomfortable
with your ring.

1019644 1023262 As if you were...
unaccustomed to wearing it.
1023356 1024812 No, I never take it off.

1031364 1035403 Do these names
mean anything to you?

1043543 1045250 Why are you looking
for my husband?

1045962 1047748 Are you going to accuse him
of something?

1052635 1056344 - Which one?
- Ha ha. All of them.

1057306 1059422 Mrs. Murdoch,
I am sorry, I'm sorry.
1059517 1060552 I didn't mean to alarm you.

1060643 1063135 I'm so sorry that I came.
Just both made a mistake.

1064730 1067188 If you'll just give me
half a second to explain...

1098014 1101598 If we did...
I hope you're still breathing.

1130463 1132170 I mean, how do you know
I'm not the killer?

1132256 1135419 You don't seem like
the killer type. Why?

1136636 1139128 You feeling any urges
I should know about?

1220970 1224679 So it seems you've discovered
your unpleasant nature.

1228936 1232554 We might ask
the same question, yes?

1316023 1319266 What is to be done?
This man is dangerous.
1319360 1321226 It is said he is able to tune.

1322738 1325480 We have seen it
with our own eyes.

1325574 1327941 On occasion the imprinting
does not take.

1331038 1334622 We find them wandering
like lost children.
1334708 1336824 But this one was different, yes?

1336919 1338535 What has the doctor
to say about this?
1338629 1340586 He has failed to report in.

1340673 1343756 - And Mr. Quick?
- No more Mr. Quick.
1356730 1358562 Should we not know, Mr. Hand?

1359525 1362358 We had hoped to learn more
before sharing with you.

1362444 1365357 We can know nothing
until we possess him.
1366448 1368940 Mr. Night, you will take the East.

1394393 1399388 Do you really think my husband could be
capable of committing those murders?

1403068 1406527 Let's hope, for both our sakes,
that I'm wrong.
1450240 1452402 I've been so worried about you.

1457915 1460498 You know, if disappearing
is your way of punishing me...

1461710 1463747 I don't know what
you're talking about.
1466590 1469048 I found these keys in my pocket...
1469134 1471796 so I assume I live here.
1471887 1473594 You supposed to be my wife?
1480104 1483267 don't know who I am, do you?

1484608 1486019 He was worried
that this might happen.

1501709 1503746 I feel like I'm living out
someone else's nightmare.

1503836 1506624 What happened to me?
Why was I seeing a doctor?
1515431 1517217 The police are looking for you.
1517307 1519548 I know. I saw the papers.
1525733 1529271 I was with one of those women...
1533532 1534988 I... I met her outside an Automat.
1536493 1539030 I guess I wanted to test myself.

1539121 1542989 I wanted to know if I had it in me
to do those things.

1543083 1547668 Maybe I have lost my mind, but whoever
I am, I'm still me and I'm not a killer.

1563312 1566054 The car outside,
the one you arrived in.

1566148 1568435 It's a cop.
He dropped me off here.
1570611 1573194 I didn't know he was still here.
1579745 1581656 Wait. You have the wrong man.

1584541 1587659 Right now what you are
is a suspect. Turn yourself in.

1588587 1590123 I'll listen to whatever
you have to say.

1590214 1592080 You're not gonna believe
what I have to say.

1596512 1599595 There's this... this group of men.
They want me dead.

1599681 1602298 And I don't even know if...
They're not even...

1603060 1605267 Yeah, who's gonna
listen to a madman?
1612152 1614894 No one ever listens to me.

1669459 1672702 Hey, you happen to know
the way to Shell Beach?

1672796 1675663 You're kidding. Me and the missus
spent our honeymoon there.

1675757 1678465 All you gotta do is take
Main Street west to...

1683056 1686640 You know, that's funny.
I... I can't seem to remember...

1686727 1689014 if it's Main Street west
or the cross-town.

1693692 1697185 I'm sorry, Inspector,
I cannot be of more assistance...

1697279 1699065 but I am running late
for an appointment.

1699156 1701363 Well, I appreciate
your taking the time.

1709666 1711907 There's just one thing
that puzzles me.

1712002 1716621 I've met quite a few murderers
in the course of my work.
1716715 1719332 Murdoch doesn't strike me as one.

1719426 1723044 Perhaps you are not
accustomed to digging deep enough.

1723138 1725596 Well, I do know when someone
is lying to me, Doctor.

1725682 1728265 Forgive me, Inspector,
but you are not a clinician.

1728352 1732061 Judging personalities
happens to be my business.

1732147 1734104 Well, maybe you could
give me a few pointers.
1738153 1741441 You are a fastidious man, driven.
1744368 1746279 I would say your life is...

1749373 1751956 Good evening, Inspector.
I really must be going.

1807222 1811841 Most unfortunate it is that we were
forced to seek you out here.

1812769 1815431 You know how uncomfortable
we find all this...

1817858 1820976 - I'm sorry. I...
- Failed to report in, yes.

1821069 1823652 I was frightened.
I... I have a weak heart, you know.

1823739 1827528 Your weakness is not, we think,
an affair of the heart

1827617 1830234 We found this
in his hotel room.

1830329 1834197 Must we reproduce
Mr. Murdoch's memories again?

1835417 1837499 but he woke up, he knocked the syringe
right out of my hand.
1837586 1839623 I tried to stop him but he was too fast.

1840922 1844210 Only fragments.
The procedure, it was interrupted.

1844301 1848044 I... I guess it's only a matter
of rounding him up.

1849765 1853383 This is no stray, Doctor.
This one can tune.

1853810 1856552 But that's impossible.
I thought only you had that ability.

1856646 1860890 You will process another template
of the subject's memories, yes?
1860984 1862691 Of course. I'll imprint him again.

1862778 1867272 No. We require them
for a quite different purpose.

1870619 1873031 We'll talk again
after tonight's tuning, but...

1891390 1894883 Perhaps some exercise
would do you good.

1940480 1943814 I've been looking through
some of your old reports.

1947070 1951860 The kind that can make
a man's career...
1953201 1955488 Yeah, I was on that case.

1955579 1959789 And then what?
What happened then, Eddie?

1961751 1965836 I've just been spending time
on the subway, riding in circles.

1971595 1973461 I've been over every inch
of this city.

1978226 1980513 You're scaring your wife
to death, Eddie.

1983815 1986728 I don't know who she is.
I don't know who any of us are.

1988778 1990860 Do you think about
the past much, Frank?
1992324 1993780 As much as the next guy.

1994409 1997492 See, I've been trying
to remember things...

2000290 2005706 But the more I try to think back,
the more it all starts to unravel.

2007130 2010464 It's like I've just been
dreaming this life...

2010550 2014043 and when I finally wake up
I'll be somebody else.
2023480 2026472 Something to do with the case.

2027067 2030480 There is no case.
There never was!

2030570 2034985 It's all just a big joke!
It's a joke!
2100765 2103928 The recollections of a great lover?

2109941 2114526 You wouldn't appreciate that,
would you, Mr. Whatever your name is?

2114613 2118982 Not the sort of conquests
you would ever understand.
2138136 2140343 a tragic death in the family.
2153943 2155775 during the tuning as the others do?

2155862 2159947 I don't know. Maybe he's a step up
the evolutionary ladder.

2160033 2162866 A... A freak of nature.
He's adapting to survive.

2162952 2166286 What do you expect?
Weren't you looking for the human soul?

2166373 2168865 That's the purpose
of your little zoo, isn't it?

2168958 2172246 That's why you keep changing people
and things around every night.

2172337 2175375 Maybe you have finally found
what you are looking for...

2175465 2176626 and it's going
to bite you on your...

2180637 2184221 It requires several of your lifetimes
to master our gifts.

2184307 2188141 The idea that a simple man
could develop the ability to tune...
2278777 2280017 You think you've got it tough?

2280111 2281977 You try looking after these kids,
for a change.

2282906 2287025 Anyways, Frederickson says he'll
take me off the damn night shift soon.

2602934 2606552 Probably have maid's quarters
before the night is through.

2664620 2666736 That's no way to greet
a patient, Doctor.

2666831 2668538 If that's what you are,
huh, Doctor?

2670084 2671870 What is happening here?
Why is everyone asleep?
2671961 2674293 Shh. Please keep your voice down.

2674380 2676246 Why can't I remember anything?
What have you done to me?

2676340 2679048 Nothing, nothing.
Please, I want to help you.

2680469 2682631 It is not safe.
If they see us together, they'll...

2682722 2684087 I don't care.
I want some answers.
2686767 2688633 Why are they trying to kill me?
2695151 2698234 My God. You really can do it.

2699655 2701862 Listen to me, John.
You have their power.

2701949 2703986 You can make things happen
by will alone.

2704076 2707319 They call it tuning. That is how they make
the buildings change.

2707413 2709905 Just now you acted out
of self-defense. A reflex.

2709999 2712787 But I can teach you to control
your power consciously.

2712877 2715164 Let me help you, John.
Together we can stop them.
2715254 2716836 We can take the city back.

2772395 2775012 He made a terrible
impression for the firm...

2777483 2780316 So I simply told Frederickson
I was going to have to let him go.
2780403 2783111 And well you should have, darling.
2785783 2787023 I don't know where he has gone.

2907363 2910822 Tonight's experiment shall be conducted
in the following locations.

2910908 2915277 The first subject
shall be imprinted here on Avenue M.
2915371 2917829 Mr. Book. There is a... a problem.

2917915 2921203 There is no Avenue M.
We were unable to complete it.

2921293 2924957 During the last tuning
we detected a lack of control.

2927758 2932468 Then this man Murdoch
is more powerful than we thought.
2934348 2938842 So we must become like him.

2938936 2941303 The good doctor
has done as we asked?

2941397 2944685 The life and times
of John Murdoch, Volume 2.

2949405 2952898 Murdoch does not possess
these memories, yes?

2952992 2955609 How will his imprint
allow us to find him?

2958080 2960663 everyone he seeks out
will be known to us.

2960749 2965664 And as he follows the clues,
so shall we follow the memories.

2965754 2968371 Perhaps we have forgotten
what happened last time, when we...

2973554 2980802 If Mr. Hand wishes to make this sacrifice
for the greater good...

2982938 2988058 But to imprint one of us.
Failure has always resulted.

2988152 2991645 What Mr. Hand proposes
is our only option.
3043541 3047079 I have John Murdoch... in mind.

3053801 3057214 "I found this postcard
among your mother's things."

3094675 3097463 Excuse me. Can you tell
me the way to Avenue C?
3104393 3107306 You, uh, been working here long?

3108397 3112766 25 years. No days off
for good behavior.
3176090 3178172 A dead end, yes, Mr. Wall.

3178258 3180795 We thought his imprint would
allow us to track him, yes...

3180886 3183253 but instead we have
been brought here.

3187393 3190761 and we must follow
where they lead, yes.

3190854 3195314 Mr. Sleep suggests he may go
to places familiar... his job.
3195401 3197392 He does not care about our job.

3210165 3213749 how my wife had hurt me
by sleeping with another man.

3218507 3222000 I would look for a way
to hurt her in return.
3240320 3241606 How do I get to the end of the line?

3254293 3255624 - You want platform 2.
- Got it. Thanks a lot.
3256754 3258165 How come that train didn't stop?
3261091 3262957 There's no way out, you know?

3263051 3265964 You can't get out of the city.
Believe me, I've tried.
3269183 3270890 The one they've been looking for.

3270976 3272808 - Who are you?
- Used to be a cop.
3273520 3275978 At least, in this life, I was.

3279026 3280812 Then they swap them around
between us.

3280903 3283520 I've seen them do it.
Back and forth, back and forth...

3283614 3285651 till no one knows
who they are anymore.
3285741 3286981 How do you know all this?

3287075 3291319 Once in a while, one of us wakes up
while they're changing things.

3291413 3293620 It's not supposed to happen,
but it does.
3295751 3297662 They'll come looking for you, Murdoch.
3298796 3300412 Just like they'll come looking for me.
3320025 3322312 This was to be his home.
3325072 3326858 That was when we loved her.
3326949 3328781 This is all well and good, Mr. Hand...

3328867 3333361 But we require a more practical link
to his present whereabouts.
3338544 3340876 And I know where to find her.

3348720 3351587 We're very lucky,
when you think about it.

3352724 3356968 To be able to revisit those places
which have meant so very much to us.

3357813 3359850 I thought it was more
that we were haunted by them.

3368365 3370026 in which your memories
were not your own...

3370117 3373655 but those shared
by every other of your kind.

3374413 3378657 Imagine the torment
of such an existence...
3378750 3381208 no experiences to call your own.
3383839 3386046 If it was all you knew...
3386133 3387840 maybe it would be a comfort.

3388510 3391218 But if you were to discover
something different...

3398937 3401520 There used to be a ferry
when I was a boy.
3403400 3406518 Lit up like a floating birthday cake.

3407779 3409986 That's just what my husband
once said to me...

3415162 3418655 I wish I knew.
What brings you here?
3419458 3422291 I met my wife at this place.
3422377 3424118 It's where I first met my husband.

3544875 3547708 I thought you'd forgotten
your Uncle Karl.

3548503 3551086 You son of a gun!
Ha ha ha ha!
3551173 3553255 Ah ha ha ha ha ha!
3573403 3575394 Shell Beach is where I grew up?

3579076 3582239 I need to get there, Karl.
How do I get there?

3583997 3586989 - I haven't been there in years.
- Come on. You must remember.

3593423 3596336 The old cracker barrel
ain't what it used to be.

3605560 3607927 You were always scribbling
in that damn book.
3608480 3611063 That's me and your pa. Ha!
3611149 3613311 What a couple of handsome fools.

3624788 3627155 They died when their house
burnt down.

3645392 3647975 You burnt your arm
pretty bad in the fire.

3653525 3656813 - What does it mean, Johnny?
- It means these are all lies!
3660740 3662697 Why are you here, Mrs. Murdoch?

3671835 3674293 My husband told me
he'd been here.

3678133 3680420 He told me he wanted
to test himself...

3695192 3698981 I wanted to talk to her. I thought maybe
she could help me find him.

3700197 3702655 Stay here.
I'm gonna call the station.

3714002 3719122 Yeah, this is Bumstead. Send the
homicide coroner to 1440... East, yeah.

3722260 3725469 It's the same pattern.
I'll explain when you get here.
3737525 3739687 It's OK. I won't hurt you.
3751748 3753659 Where the hell did she come from?
3784906 3787898 Are you ready to go home, Mrs. Murdoch?
3787993 3790610 The inspector is gonna take me. Thanks.
3819399 3822642 It was a gift from my mother.

3825280 3827612 I keep it with me
to remind me of her.

3836541 3838908 I can't remember
when she gave it to me.

3841463 3844455 How do you think I could
forget a thing like that?

3846634 3850798 Do you think about the past much,
Mrs. Murdoch?
3855810 3858472 I'm not sure I know anymore.
3862025 3864562 I left your old room like it was.
3864652 3866734 You can sleep here tonight, huh?
3866821 3869062 Glad to have you back, Johnny...
3869157 3870773 even if it is for just a night.

3874287 3878121 Why, sure. That clock's
kept perfect time since I bought it.

3882670 3884581 I don't understand.
How can it be night already?

3884672 3886333 What happened to the day?
How'd I miss it?

3890762 3894346 get some sleep. We'll straighten
all this out tomorrow.

3953199 3955065 Keep him there,
and I'll be right over.
3963084 3964574 We just have to play it as it comes.

3964669 3968162 Johnny, we...
We just wanted to help. Ha.

3978433 3982097 Johnny, if you're in some kind of trouble...
well, maybe we could do something.
3983605 3986063 Haven't seen you in so long.

4060640 4066010 Mr. Murdoch... you've been
the cause of much distress.

4070066 4072433 - Start talking.
- There's no need for this.
4073945 4075902 The city's ours. We made it.

4077532 4080650 We fashioned this city
on stolen memories...

4080743 4084532 different eras, different pasts
all rolled into one.
4084622 4087080 Each night, we revise it, refine it...

4096259 4099297 - Why?!
- We need to be like you.
4100263 4102595 I understand you now, Mr. Murdoch.

4102682 4106175 I remember that which you do not...
what you've been missing.
4108980 4111563 running along the waves as a child...

4111649 4116564 meeting Emma at the river...
That first kiss that followed.
4120199 4123112 We use your dead as vessels.
4269307 4271765 What about her? Ring any bells?
4271851 4273137 She was alive when I left her.
4274353 4276310 This is nothing. I... This is...

4276397 4278638 It must mean something,
all those pictures.

4281986 4284774 Stop playing games with me, Murdoch!
Stop telling me lies!
4284864 4286320 I am not telling you lies!

4286407 4288739 Help me out here.
Make me understand.

4288826 4290863 I have this jigsaw puzzle
in front of my face...

4290953 4293911 and every time I try to rearrange the
pieces, it still doesn't make any sense.

4293998 4295329 What... You... You...
think it makes sense to me?
4295416 4297407 I'm as much in the dark here as you are.
4297502 4299664 You let me ask you a question?

4300755 4302120 You heard of a place
called Shell Beach?

4302215 4304673 - Sure.
- You know how to get there?

4306219 4310338 Oh, all right. You just, uh...
You go to the...
4312350 4314432 Just give me a second, will ya?
4320608 4321973 You think that's kind of odd?
4325112 4326443 I got a better one for you.

4327865 4330698 you remember doing
something during the day?
4331911 4334118 I just mean... during the day.

4336290 4337780 When was the last time
you remember seeing it?

4337875 4341584 And I'm not talking about some distant,
half-forgotten childhood memory.

4341671 4344754 I mean like yesterday?
Last week? When?

4344841 4347253 Can you come up
with a single memory?

4350137 4353300 You know something?
I don't think the sun even...

4356143 4360353 'Cause I've been up for hours and hours
and hours and the night never ends here.

4361148 4363731 - That is crazy.
- You're damn right this is crazy.

4363818 4366185 Listen to me, Bumstead.
It's not just me.
4368322 4369812 They're doing something to all of us.

4369907 4371745 Shut up, you... I've...
I've heard enough.

4372702 4374443 - Shut up, will ya! Shut up!
- Listen to me.

4384672 4387960 There has to be an explanation
for this somewhere.
4421208 4422994 I never meant to hurt you, John...

4423085 4424166 and I did it,
and I don't know why I did.
4424253 4426369 I wish I could take it all back.
4426464 4428956 No. Emma... You didn't do it.

4429050 4431758 This... affair of yours,
whatever it is...

4431844 4433426 the thing you're
supposed to have done...

4433512 4435298 you didn't do it.
I don't believe it ever happened.
4436849 4439136 I know this is gonna sound crazy...

4439226 4442139 but what if we never
knew each other before now?
4442229 4444561 What if the first time we ever met...

4444649 4448438 was last night in your...
in our apartment...

4451489 4454322 and everything that I'm supposed
to remember never really happened?
4454408 4456945 Someone just wants us to think it did.
4462124 4464491 You know, back in the apartment...

4465294 4467752 I suddenly felt like
I didn't know you at all.
4469548 4472040 It was as if you were a stranger.
4474303 4476044 But how can that be true?
4476639 4480724 I so vividly remember meeting you.
4480810 4483848 I remember falling in love with you.
4505501 4508209 You can't fake something like that.

4546625 4550368 I... um... kind of thought
you should know.

4553007 4555669 Oh, and...
the chief wanted to see you.
4564101 4566092 I knew you'd track the killer down, sir.
4596050 4597131 How can we help you, sir?

4622034 4625618 I wanted to be the first
to congratulate you... about the case.

4664243 4666860 Don't you think it's about time
you started giving me some answers?
4674044 4676035 I... I come here quite often.

4676130 4678542 It's one of the few places
I'm allowed a moments peace.

4678632 4681966 You... You see,
they have an aversion to... to water.

4683137 4685549 One could almost call it a phobia.
Ha ha ha ha.

4685639 4688882 Who are they?
What do they want from me?
4690561 4692552 Well, for now, let's just say...

4692646 4695308 that you were the subject
of their experiment.
4701780 4703487 And you are not a murderer.
4705451 4707158 I'm sorry about this. I truly am.
4707244 4708734 But we do not have much time...

4708829 4711412 and I cannot afford the luxury
of doing this the right way.

4713042 4715329 all the answers
are in this syringe.
4715419 4716580 I need you to inject yourself.

4716670 4719002 It's the only way to
make you understand.

4720424 4723382 We're running out of time, John.
You have to do this now.

4725512 4727879 Inspector, he is more
disturbed than we thought.

4727973 4730635 I may not be the judge of personality
that you are, Doctor...

4730726 4733684 but you're the one
who looks disturbed to me.

4734605 4736391 You do not know
what you are doing.
4737608 4741192 What, exactly is in this... Doctor?

4742947 4745109 All the answers you've
been looking for, John.

4747826 4752821 Guess I'll just have to
hold on to it for... safekeeping.

4756877 4762213 - Go? Where are we going?
- Shell Beach.
4763300 4765587 That's where you want to go, isn't it?
4779525 4781107 What do you hope to gain by helping me?

4783529 4786442 None of these maps extend far enough
to show the ocean.

4787950 4789816 I promise you!
I've been there, and...

4789910 4792447 If you've been there,
you can show us the way, then, can't you?

4798419 4801161 I refuse.
You... You can't make me go there!

4827323 4830861 I don't understand.
Used to be a bridge here.

4837624 4839160 Try that again,
your friends are gonna be...
4839251 4840537 fishing you out of the canal.

4840627 4841958 Just don't hurt me.
I'll tell you everything.

4861357 4865897 We will give you some more
pretty things soon... Anna.
4875412 4878279 I have another use for her first.

4885005 4890216 First there was darkness.
Then came the strangers.

4892388 4894675 They abducted us
and brought us here.

4900187 4903020 They mix and match
our memories as they see fit...

4903107 4905849 trying to divine
what makes us unique.

4906568 4909276 One day, a man
might be an inspector.

4912366 4915609 When they want to
study a murderer for instance...

4915702 4919491 they simply imprint one of their citizens
with a new personality...

4920624 4924618 arrange a family for him,
friends, an entire history...

4930175 4934214 Will a man, given the history
of a killer, continue in that vein?

4934304 4938263 Or are we, in fact, more
than the mere sum of our memories?

4938350 4943311 This business of you being a killer
was an unhappy coincidence.

4943397 4946185 You have had dozens
of lives before now.

4946275 4949609 You just happened to wake up
while I was imprinting you with this one.
4950404 4952486 Why are they doing all of this?
4952573 4955907 It is our capacity for individuality...

4955993 4958485 our souls that makes
us different from them.

4958579 4960911 They think they
can find the human soul...

4960998 4964081 if they understand
how our memories work.

4969840 4973208 Their entire race
is on the brink of extinction.
4973302 4975134 They think we can save them.

4975220 4977632 - Where do I fit in?
- You are different, John.

4978265 4981098 You resisted my attempt
to imprint you.

4985772 4989106 Somehow you have developed
their ability to tune.
4989193 4990399 That is how they change things.
4990486 4991976 That is how they built this city.

4992070 4994937 They have machines buried deep
beneath the surface...

4995032 4998946 that allow them
to focus their telepathic energies.

4999828 5002240 They control everything here,
even the sun.

5002331 5005665 That's why it's always dark.
They can't stand the light.
5005751 5006957 So why do they need you?

5007044 5011379 When they first brought us here,
they extracted what was in us.

5011465 5015254 So they could store the information,
remix it like so much paint...

5015344 5017836 and give us back new memories
of their choosing.

5017930 5021548 But they still needed an artist
to help them.

5023393 5026511 I understood the intricacies
of the human mind...

5029149 5031857 so they allowed me
to keep my skills as a scientist...

5033403 5035861 But they made me
delete everything else.

5044248 5047036 Can you imagine what
it is like being forced...

5048877 5052211 What about my past?
What about my childhood?
5058804 5060636 This was blank when I found it!

5062808 5065926 You were never a boy...
not in this place.

5066019 5068761 Your entire history is an illusion,
a fabrication...
5068855 5070687 as it is with all of us.

5070774 5073232 You made those drawings
happen with your gift.
5073318 5075184 You say they brought us here.
5164242 5168327 There is nothing beyond the city.
5222634 5224796 And now you know the truth.

5293413 5296280 You'll allow yourself
to surrender, Mr. Murdoch...

5296374 5298536 or it will result in
this one's death, yes?

5298627 5301119 What do I care?
She's not my real wife!

5302380 5306544 But you do still care,
don't you, Mr. Murdoch?

5306635 5309252 You see, I have
become the monster...

5313141 5317055 Shall I end her life now
as you would have?

5374244 5377111 The doctor was right.
He has evolved.

5392804 5397219 Dangerous. But he can also
lead us to what we seek.
5397309 5400643 What the doctor calls the soul.

5400729 5404393 It is time for our experiment
to move into a final phase.

5404482 5407144 We no longer need
the other subjects.
5407235 5410819 The time for study is over.

5410906 5415116 It is time to be one
with John Murdoch.

5450153 5454693 They want to imprint you
with their own collective memories.

5456034 5460153 They want to make you one of them,
so they can share your soul.
5470548 5473540 The pain will only last a moment.

5487607 5489518 You'll rise to greater
heights than that, my boy.

5489609 5491395 One day when you're older,
you'll understand.

5498493 5501656 Now remember
what I told you. Never talk to strangers.

5503581 5506369 You're probably wondering why I keep
appearing in your memories.

5506459 5508951 It is because I have
inserted myself in them.

5509045 5511082 All of these memories
have been fabricated...
5511172 5512833 to teach you about the strangers.

5512924 5516042 Give you a lifetime of knowledge
in a single syringe.
5532819 5534856 You're getting the hang of it, John.

5534946 5536983 Maybe one day
I'll be working for you.

5537824 5540987 This is the machine the strangers use
to amplify their thoughts.
5542996 5544486 You must take control of it.
5544581 5546163 You must make the machine yours.
5546249 5548331 I know you can beat them, John.
5562849 5565557 There is no time for romance, John.
5565643 5567930 The world can be what you make it.

5570065 5572557 You have the power
to make anything happen...
5859020 5860431 I knew you could do it, John.
5866652 5869394 She is not Emma anymore, John.
5870948 5872564 So give her back her memories.

5872658 5875070 I can't. The facility
where the strangers...
5880375 5883083 What are you going to do now, John?

5884837 5888626 You told me I had
the power, didn't you?

5889008 5891500 I can make these machines
do anything I want.

5893179 5895511 Make this world anything
I want it to be.

5896516 5899554 Just so long as I concentrate
hard enough.

6093421 6096755 I'm just making a few little changes
around here, is all.
6096841 6098548 Are we sure that's what we want?
6099051 6101463 I'm prepared to take my chances.

6103055 6106047 Your imprint is not
agreeable with my kind.

6107518 6109759 But I wanted to know
what it was like...

6112690 6115307 You know how I was
supposed to feel.

6119238 6122947 You wanted to know what it was
about us that made us human.

6124327 6127661 Well, you're not going
to find it... in here.

6129415 6132032 You went looking
in the wrong place.

6245030 6247818 Do you know if Shell Beach
is around here?
6247908 6250525 I think that's it just over there.
6272725 6274716 Would you like to join me?
